DOC.brief_summary: The overall objective project develop pilot-test web-based smoking cessation program specifically address heavy drinking ( HD ) . The project build upon well-established , free evidence-based smoking cessation website , BecomeAnEX.org ( `` EX '' ) , support Truth Initiative , national non-profit public health organization , research arm , Schroeder Institute . Investigators develop alternative version BecomenAnEX include detailed content alcohol 's relation smoking relapse , health effect alcohol ( include moderate drinking recommendation ) along related worksheet , feedback material , link resource drink . Once version BecomeAnEX develop specifically address HD ( call EX-HD ) , investigator conduct one-arm open pilot site 30 HD smoker recruit newly register BecomeAnEX user . DOC.criteria: 1. current daily smoking least one cigarette per day 2. meeting NIAAA criterion past month heavy atrisk drinking ( woman : drinking 8+ drink per week consume 4+ drink one occasion least past month ; men : drinking 15+ drink per week consume 5+ drink one occasion least past month ) 3. age 18 old 4. willingness provide contact mail information follow consent 1. history severe alcohol withdrawal indicate past alcoholinduced seizure delirium tremens ;
